channel.title: Comments on: 5 Years Of Working Out
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Thanks a lot :)
The only one who said anything yesterday was Sharon, who always calls me fat :S
And yes... I celebrated by buying raisin bran cereal (which is sweet and contains sugar) instead of my normal sugarless bran cereal :)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a lot :)

The only one who said anything yesterday was Sharon, who always calls me fat :S

And yes… I celebrated by buying raisin bran cereal (which is sweet and contains sugar) instead of my normal sugarless bran cereal :)

item.title: By: Shahar Kuchuk
item.dc:creator: Shahar Kuchuk
item.description:
I forgot to mention it in last night's dinner but you look slim! Maybe too slim or maybe I'm just not used to see you like that :) Your face lost its roundness and got edgy.
Anyway 5 years is well worth celebrating...
item.content:encoded:
I forgot to mention it in last night’s dinner but you look slim!
Maybe too slim or maybe I’m just not used to see you like that :)
Your face lost its roundness and got edgy.

Anyway 5 years is well worth celebrating…

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Yeah, I try to watch myself even though it's tempting to push harder every time.
Thanks. Chag Sameah :)
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I try to watch myself even though it’s tempting to push harder every time.

Thanks. Chag Sameah :)

item.title: By: Kila
item.dc:creator: Kila
item.description:
Wow - 12 KM!!!
Watch out for knees problems. Lots of athletes switch to other sports (from running) after they start having knee problems, like swimming and cycling.
Chag Sameah.
item.content:encoded:
Wow – 12 KM!!!

Watch out for knees problems.
Lots of athletes switch to other sports (from running) after they start having knee problems, like swimming and cycling.

Chag Sameah.
